title: New York Stories - part 1
content: [Stewf](http://web.archive.org/wiki/Stephen%20Coles) spotted me [being very useless](http://web.archive.org/web/20060618115051/http:/www.fontshop.de/fontblog/C1716572149/E1934643615/index.html) after helping set up the FiFFteen exhibition. The red T-shirt is [Stefan Hattenbach](http://web.archive.org/wiki/Stefan%20Hattenbach)’s “Who needs Helvetica?” MacRhino/Fountain joint venture.
author: Bald Condensed
